actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Nez Perce National Forest as the Gospel-Hump Wilderness Area, and to return other contiguous lands to multiple use management.
short_title: Gospel-Hump Roadless Area Land Allocation Act

summary.text: Gospel-Hump Roadless Area Land Allocation Act - Designates specified lands in the Nez Perce National Forest, in the State of Idaho, as the Gospel-Hump Wilderness Area. States that specified contiguous lands shall be developed according to a multipurpose resource development plan. Requires the Secretary of Agriculture to appoint a seven-member Advisory Committee on the Management of the Gospel-Hump Area.

titles.title: Gospel-Hump Roadless Area Land Allocation Act
A bill to designate certain lands in the Nez Perce National Forest as the Gospel-Hump Wilderness Area, and to return other contiguous lands to multiple use management.
